Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are calling for changes to be made in the upcoming federal budget to help ease the financial struggles many are facing. GPs hope for more affordable healthcare while homelessness advocates demand more support for young people to address the nation's homelessness crisis. On the other hand political parties are criticizing each other over the issue of jobseeker rate. Meanwhile a committee tasked with investigating the issue has urged for a "substantial" increase ahead of the budget. However amid these calls a social media post expresses disappointment at Federal Labor's announcement that they will not increase the JobSeeker rate.
